pr_title: Roll back recent unit image factory changes

timeline.message:
Revert "Image Factory simplifications (#7129)"

This reverts commit 8bab1a9d24260a8234f88bc541a4fb9d14064d64.

Revert "Abstract image factory (#7128)"

This reverts commit 8234c2d85d7245bb7d7ba4cfd6319faac8c27e4e.

Revert "Improve no unit image found error (#7115)"

This reverts commit 0c7df8a779b2958fcb9401dbf217e90ede4fefbe.

Revert "Cache Images in UnitImageFactory & not ImageIcon; Simplify using ImageLoader over Toolkit (#7113)"

This reverts commit ed535f11cb21d09d7c2fd3f96242ee7eadb64c7a.
Revert call to 'getUnscaledImage' to previous method name

timeline.bodyText: Method getTransformedImage has a Cognitive Complexity of 9 (exceeds 7 allowed). Consider refactoring.
timeline.author: codeclimate
